AI music generation tool






The system uses NLP preprocessing and machine learning classification to automatically identify the category of AI tools based on their description.

The trained NLP model can generalize across multiple AI domains such as healthcare, finance, cybersecurity, education, and automation by learning semantic features from text descriptions using TF-IDF vectorization.
